brief_title: An Investigational Drug Study in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus (0431-024)
brief_summary: The purpose of this investigational study is to determine the safety and effectiveness of an investigational drug in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus (a specific type of diabetes).
detailed_description: The duration of treatment is 104 weeks.
description: Sitagliptin 100 mg oral tablets of sitagliptin once daily.
Glipizide 1 tablet (5 mg) per day. Patients could then up-titrated to a total daily dose of 4 tablets twice daily (20mg/day) based on their glycemic control.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Patients who are at least 18 years of age and not older than 78 with type 2 diabetes mellitus
